overview: Kenna James is tossing and turning, thinking about her whirlwind summer adventure. She snaps out of it and gets dressed and off to work. While at work, one of the interns, Lisa, asks her out for drinks after work, mainly as a thank you. Kenna agrees but instead of going to a bar, she brings Lisa back to her place. A slow seduction starts as it's obvious Lisa has a crush on Kenna and that Kenna may being attracted to her as well.
title: Burn So Bright
